sections.title: 🔍 Quick Diagnostics
sections.content_preview:
Run diagnostics first to identify issues:
```bash
scripts/bash/diagnose.sh     # Unix/macOS
scripts/windows/diagnose.bat      # Windows
```

sections.title: 📊 Diagnostic Decision Tree
sections.content_preview:
```
Dashboard Issue?
├─ Won't Start?
│  ├─ Check Node.js version (16+)
│  ├─ Run npm install
│  └─ Check port availability
├─ Can't Access?
│  ├─ Chec...

sections.title: 🆘 Getting Help
sections.content_preview:
If issues persist after troubleshooting:

1. **Run full diagnostics** and save output:
   ```bash
   npm run diagnose > diagnostic-output.txt
   ```

...

🔍 Quick Diagnostics.content_preview:
Run diagnostics first to identify issues:
```bash
scripts/bash/diagnose.sh     # Unix/macOS
scripts/windows/diagnose.bat      # Windows
```

Dashboard Won't Start.content_preview:
**Solution:**
- Install Node.js 16 or higher from https://nodejs.org/
- Verify: `node -v`

Authentication Issues.content_preview:
**Solution:**
1. Check if authentication is enabled in `.env`:
   ```
   DASHBOARD_AUTH_ENABLED=true
   DASHBOARD_USERNAME=admin
   DASHBOARD_PASSWORD...

Health Check Failures.content_preview:
**Solution:**
1. View detailed health status:
   ```bash
   curl http://localhost:3001/api/health | json_pp
   ```
2. Check specific failures and addr...

Real-time Updates Not Working.content_preview:
**Solution:**
1. Check WebSocket connection in browser console
2. Ensure file watcher has permissions:
   ```bash
   chmod -R 755 project-documents  #...

API Errors.content_preview:
**Solution:**
- Ensure you're accessing dashboard from allowed origin
- Add origin to CORS whitelist in server configuration

📊 Diagnostic Decision Tree.content_preview:
```
Dashboard Issue?
├─ Won't Start?
│  ├─ Check Node.js version (16+)
│  ├─ Run npm install
│  └─ Check port availability
├─ Can't Access?
│  ├─ Chec...

🆘 Getting Help.content_preview:
If issues persist after troubleshooting:

1. **Run full diagnostics** and save output:
   ```bash
   npm run diagnose > diagnostic-output.txt
   ```

...
